ticket.title: Action performance summary does not include all the time spent in activerecord
ticket.original-body: The performance breakdown at the end of an action doesn't include all time spent in activerecord - it only includes time spent until the point where the view finishes rendering. If more time is spent afterwards (or if no view is rendered at all, ie the response is a redirect) then it is not included in the total
